channel.title: Rune-Company Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/dfsdgdfgdfgcopy.png[/img] ____________________________________________________________________________ [b] One day i really wanted to pk, so i headed to the Moparscape status page to find a server to play. And then i realized , they where all shit.I've seen servers with 100 - 300 Players owned by idiots that have no idea how to code annything. servers full of shitty customs and screwed clients , and the only reason they have so many players is because its the best server out of the shit available. So I've Decided to give people another Choice.A better choice . Rune-Company[/b] [IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/2q3dkcj.gif[/img]Features:[IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/2q3dkcj.gif[/img]
*Fully Working Wilderness. *Daily Updates. *Fully working headicons. *Fully working Hint icon. *Some Old Skool Costums! *Almost finished dueling. *Fully Barrows. *Fully working autocasting on players. *Perfect 1v1 areas with PvP combat. *Perfect following and combat following. *Perfect PvP and NvP combat. *::Item Command *::Setlevel Command *::Barrows Command *::DuelArena Command *Most special attacks added. *Edge 1v1. *Varrock Team pk. *Prayer Works 100%. *Perfect attack and defence bonuses. *And more! *Join today and find out. (PvP = PlayerVSPlayer) (PvN = PlayerVSNPC) ____________________________________________________________________________ -INFO- [IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/21617d.gif[/img] -Pking- Rune-Company is an [b]'Old Skool' [/b]pking server. Which means NO shitty dragon claws; NO godswords; NO PvP armour. There are still items such as the Fighter's torso, defenders,etc.
[IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/15x2zkh.gif[/img] -Minigames- There are only 2 Minigames [b]Duel Arena[/b] and [b]Barrows.[/b] We are working on making more minigames. ____________________________________________________________________________
-Pics-
[IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Rune-company1.png[/img]

item.title: Rune-Company Development
item.dc:creator: @FtwCScape FtwCScape
item.description:
@FtwCScape wrote:

[center]


One day i really wanted to pk, so i headed to the Moparscape status page to find a server to play.
And then i realized , they where all shit.I’ve seen servers with 100 - 300 Players owned by idiots that have no idea how to code annything. servers full of shitty customs and screwed clients ,
and the only reason they have so many players is because its the best server out of the shit available. So I’ve Decided to give people another Choice.A better choice . Rune-Company
Features:

*Fully Working Wilderness.
*Daily Updates.
*Fully working headicons.
*Fully working Hint icon.
*Some Old Skool Costums!
*Almost finished dueling.
*Fully Barrows.
*Fully working autocasting on players.
*Perfect 1v1 areas with PvP combat.
*Perfect following and combat following.
*Perfect PvP and NvP combat.
*::Item Command
*::Setlevel Command
*::Barrows Command
*::DuelArena Command
*Most special attacks added.
*Edge 1v1.
*Varrock Team pk.
*Prayer Works 100%.
*Perfect attack and defence bonuses.
*And more!
*Join today and find out.
(PvP = PlayerVSPlayer)
(PvN = PlayerVSNPC)

-INFO-

-Pking-
Rune-Company is an ‘Old Skool’ pking server.
Which means NO shitty dragon claws; NO godswords; NO PvP armour.
There are still items such as the Fighter’s torso, defenders,etc.


-Minigames-
There are only 2 Minigames
Duel Arena and Barrows.
We are working on making more minigames.

-Pics-

sqddf.png711×323
